content.question: Which of the following is most likely an effect of the trend in the line graph?

choices.label: An increase in accountability of the bureaucracy
A decrease in the length of regulatory bills passed by Congress
A decrease in congressional oversight as a mechanism to control the bureaucracy
An increase in the authority of the House of Representatives over the bureaucracy

content.answer: A decrease in congressional oversight as a mechanism to control the bureaucracy
